channel.title: xstarter - GNU/Linux terminal application launcher
channel.description: xstarter - terminal application launcher for GNU/Linux

item.title: Emacs interface available
item.description: New Emacs package allows to launch application with xstarter directly from Emacs!

item.title: Version 0.8.0 released
item.description: New version of xstarter is available (v0.7.0). It adds one useful feature: you can now provide arguments to the application. It works for GUI and terminal programs alike.

item.title: Version 0.7.0 released
item.description: New version of xstarter is available (v0.7.0). It adds one useful feature: you can now provide arguments to the application. It works for GUI and terminal programs alike.
